org.apache.giraph.comm.netty

类 NettyClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.giraph.comm.netty.NettyClient

  • public class NettyClient
extends Object
    Netty client for sending requests. Thread-safe.

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      static String LIMIT_NUMBER_OF_OPEN_REQUESTS
      Do we have a limit on number of open requests we can have
      static boolean LIMIT_NUMBER_OF_OPEN_REQUESTS_DEFAULT
      Default choice about having a limit on number of open requests
      static int MAX_CONNECTION_MILLISECONDS_DEFAULT
      30 seconds to connect by default
      static int MAX_DESTINATION_TASK_IDS_TO_LIST
      Maximum number of destination task ids with open requests to list (for debugging)
      static String MAX_NUMBER_OF_OPEN_REQUESTS
      Maximum number of requests without confirmation we should have
      static int MAX_NUMBER_OF_OPEN_REQUESTS_DEFAULT
      Default maximum number of requests without confirmation
      static int MAX_REQUESTS_TO_LIST
      Maximum number of requests to list (for debugging)
      static org.jboss.netty.channel.ChannelLocal<SaslNettyClient> SASL
      Used to authenticate with other workers acting as servers

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明

      Only constructor

      方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void authenticate()
      Authenticate all servers in addressChannelMap.
      void connectAllAddresses(Collection<? extends TaskInfo> tasks)
      Connect to a collection of tasks servers
      void sendWritableRequest(Integer destTaskId, WritableRequest request)
      Send a request to a remote server (should be already connected)
      void stop()
      Stop the client.
      void waitAllRequests()
      Ensure all the request sent so far are complete.

      • connectAllAddresses

        public void connectAllAddresses(Collection<? extends TaskInfo> tasks)
        Connect to a collection of tasks servers
        参数:
        tasks - Tasks to connect to (if haven't already connected)

        Authenticate all servers in addressChannelMap.

        Stop the client.

      • sendWritableRequest

                       WritableRequest request)
        Send a request to a remote server (should be already connected)
        参数:
        destTaskId - Destination task id
        request - Request to send

      • waitAllRequests

        Ensure all the request sent so far are complete.
        抛出:
